Reference

Clustering

Functions that help with clustering

distMat()

Distance matrices

findK()

Find number of centroids

Plots

Functions that do plots

addIMGtopanel()

Add images to a ggplot facet plot

dendIMG()

Draw dendrogram with images

kheatmap()

Heat map function

myheatmap()

Plot the heat map

yearTable()

Plot images by years and month

Image utilities

checkunits()

Get or convert the units from a projection string

desat()

Desaturate colors

imgVectortoRaster()

Convert vector images to rasters

only.holes()

Keep only holes in polygons

Auto-detection

Functions for the auto-detection of upwelling

autoDetect1()

Autodetection algorithm 1

autoDetect3()

Autodetection algorithm 3

getNearestPointOnLine()

Find nearest point to lines

getStatsAlongLine()

Get the mean raster values along a line

getStatsAroundPoint()

Get the mean raster values around a point

makeCoastBuffer()

Make a coastline buffer

Data

Data

getdata()

Download data from an ERDDAP server

import_erddap()

Download data from an ERDDAP server

processCSV()

Read in image csv

processOIData()

Process Optimal Interpolation data

sample_raster

Sample Raster

smoothCoastData

Smoothed coast data objects
